title: S champion lvling up shard glitch?
body:
I've got kayn lvl 6 and trying to lvl him up. I'll tell you what happened from teh begining. My friend and me started a queue while in the queue I upgraded kayn to lvl 6. We got a match after that and we accepted it. After the game, I got an S and it said I had a shard. I went to my loot but it wasn't there.
Tell me if its a glitch.
1 day later today when I go into my loot it says there is data missing and it cant retrieve it. Then it says restart client, I did that 3 times and it said the same thing.

replies.body:
I haven't heard of this issue, so it might be some sort of fringe bug. I'd definitely recommend reaching out to Riot Games Player Support via ticket to double check that your stats are properly synced. 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

Sorry I couldn't be of more help!
